code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a 28 year old white female web designer C/O mild fever, mild small red spots on skin and mild bleeding from gums. NKDA. o:Height 167 cm, Weight 93.3 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17, Skin = scattered petechiae a:Leukemia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed cytarabine - 100 mg/m2/day IV infusion, methotrexate - 1200 mg/m2 IV infusion, hydrocortisone - 8 mg/kg IV infusion, and ordered CBC.

s:patient complains of mild fever for 3 days. NKDA. she is a 29 yo female web designer. she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life denies any alcohol use o:Height 167 cm, Weight 94.9 kg, Temperature 37.4 C, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 116, DiastolicBP 78, Respiration 17, Skin = scattered petechiae a:Leukemia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed cytarabine - 100 mg/m2/day IV infusion, methotrexate - 1200 mg/m2 IV infusion, hydrocortisone - 8 mg/kg IV infusion, and ordered CBC.

content2.Unmatched: her life denies any alcohol use
